TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataContractResolver extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供在序列化及還原序列化期間，以動態方式來回對應型別與 表示的機制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for dynamically mapping types to and from representations during serialization and deserialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開發人員應謹慎正在透過網路傳送的資料。Developers should be careful about what data is being sent over the wire. 您可以使用傳輸或訊息安全性來保護該資料。You can use transport or message security to secure that data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/security-in-wcf.md)。For more information, see [Security](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/security-in-wcf.md). > [!WARNING] > 只使用如果您完全確定的序列化資訊。Only use if you are completely sure of what information is being serialized. 惡意的型別可能會導致非預期的行為。Malicious types can cause unexpected behavior. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何從 衍生類別。The following example shows how to derive a class from . 如需實用範例，請參閱 < [DataContractResolver](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/datacontractresolver.md)。For a working sample, see [DataContractResolver](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/datacontractresolver.md). [!code-csharp[DataContractResolver#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/datacontractresolver/cs/datacontractresolver.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Type ResolveName (string typeName, string typeNamespace, Type declaredType, System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver knownTypeResolver);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type ResolveName(string typeName, string typeNamespace, class System.Type declaredType, class System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver knownTypeResolver) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ResolveName (typeName As String, typeNamespace As String, declaredType As Type, knownTypeResolver As DataContractResolver) As Type
public: abstract Type ^ ResolveName(System::String ^ typeName, System::String ^ typeNamespace, Type ^ declaredType, System::Runtime::Serialization::DataContractResolver ^ knownTypeResolver);

summary.span: 覆寫這個方法，以便在還原序列化期間，將指定的 名稱和命名空間對應至資料合約型別。

span.span: Override this method to map the specified name and namespace to a data contract type during deserialization.

returns.span: 名稱和命名空間所對應的型別。

span.span: The type the name and namespace is mapped to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要在實作內使用已知的型別解析邏輯，其參考會當做 `knownTypeResolver` 參數傳入。If you want to use the known type resolution logic inside your implementation, a reference to it is passed in as the `knownTypeResolver` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會示範 方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of the method.
